d1c6fafa-b2ba-4ca1-a325-a7267e571f17.description: Candidates understand the tools to solve business problems to define the current state of a situation and identify a desired future state. They know to use mapping to design a strategy to bridge current state to future state. These candidates understand the communication needed at all levels of the organization to move their business strategies to executed initiatives that keep the customer at the forefront. Candidates can track the philosophy of the Business Architecture Guild®.
